text: trong ban bangkeut mekh teang brapir chean ruochreal knongorypel pir thngai . haey trong ban riebcham aoy mekh real chean nouv kechchakar robsa vea . haey yeung ban tobteng loma mekh cheankraom daoy hvaung tara ning karpar( ampi shai t n) . noh kuchea karkamnt robsa mcheasa del mha khlangpouke mha doeng
